root.name: Lawnmower Challenge
root.description: Lawnmower Challenge is a homage to games like Chip's Challenge and Sokuban with a modernized look and feel. The game features cel-shaded art and a great sound track which captures the mood of lawnmower puzzle solving perfectly. Your goal in the game is to mow all the grass tiles in each level while making your way around obstacles that block your path.Online PresenceURLGame Website:http://www.lawnmowerchallenge.comStudio Website:http://www.lunarenigma.comTwitter:https://twitter.com/#!/LunarEnigmaFacebook:http://www.facebook.com/LunarEnigma
